"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b118-6968-4407-2309-a86fd9609a07#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az újasszír palotadomborművek</string>
            <string language="en">new assyrian palace embossment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">neue assyrian Palastprägung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nouveau foulage assyrien de palais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">embossment assyrian novo do palácio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nuovo embossment assyrian del palazzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νέο assyrian embossment παλατιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">nuevo repujado asirio del palacio</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az újasszír palotadomborművek témáinak, ábrázolásmódjának és stílusának bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">presentation of themes, style and rendering of new assyrian palace embossment</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">asszír,  Assur,  Ninive,  Kalhu,  Assur,  Dúr-Sarrukín,  dombormű,  </string>
            <string language="en">assyrian, Assur, Ninive, Kalhu, Assur, Dur-Sarrukin, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung von Themen, von Art und von 
Übertragung der neuen assyrian Palastprägung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présentation des thèmes, du modèle et du rendu
du nouveau foulage assyrien de palais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresentação dos temas, do estilo e de render do
embossment assyrian novo do palácio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presentazione dei temi, dello stile e di 
rappresentazione del embossment assyrian nuovo del palazzo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσίαση των θεμάτων, του ύφους και της απόδοσης 
νέο assyrian embossment παλατιών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presentación de temas, del estilo y de la 
representación del nuevo repujado asirio del palacio</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Assyrian, Assur, Ninive, Kalhu, Assur, Dur-Sarrukin, 
Prägung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Assyrien, Assur, Ninive, Kalhu, Assur, Dur-Sarrukin, 
foulage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">assyrian, Assur, Ninive, Kalhu, Assur, Dur-Sarrukin, 
embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">assyrian, Assur, Ninive, Kalhu, Assur, Dur-Sarrukin, 
embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">assyrian, Assur, Ninive, Kalhu, Assur, δuρ- 
Sarrukin, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">asirio, Assur, Ninive, Kalhu, Assur, Dur-Sarrukin, 
repujado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

          <learningResourceType>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>

        <classification>

          <taxonPath>

              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
